text: Boola; “Niwina ubakabanga okhurula mwikulu nende khushialo? Nohomba niwina uli nende obunyali khumawulililo kenyu, nende tsindolelo tsienyu? Ne niwina urusinjia omulamu mubafu, ne narusia omufu mubalamu? Ne ni wina ukasinjia amakhuwa koosi?” Balaboola mbu; “Ni Nyasaye’’ mana boola mbu; “Koo shimuritsanga tawe?.”
